price: when We are closer[13] to him than you, but you do not see?
arabic: وَنَحۡنُ أَقۡرَبُ إِلَيۡهِ مِنكُمۡ وَلَٰكِن لَّا تُبۡصِرُونَ
footnotes: [13] We are closer to him in terms of Knowledge and Power; Our angels are closer in person.
